text: Mojo! is a video game created by FarSight Studios. It is owned by Crave Entertainment. It is made to be played on the PlayStation 2. The player controls a marble through a series of traps in order to break all of the coloured blocks in a stage. The player must finish the stage within a set time. There are 100 stages. Category:2003 video games Category:Marble video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Xbox games
title: Mojo!
